description:
Hi, I'm a front-end developer based in Glasgow, Scotland. I have been in the industry since 2017 and have extensive experience using a wide range of front-end technologies. 
 I have a passion for creating seamless, accessible and compelling user experiences. I take great care to empathize with users to ensure the solutions I develop work for both clients and their target audience. I have a keen eye for detail and a drive for writing clean, test-driven, maintainable code.
